text: Goshen is a village in and the county seat of Orange County, New York, United States. The population was 5,777 at the 2020 census. It is part of the Kiryas Joel–Poughkeepsie–Newburgh metropolitan area as well as the larger New York metropolitan area. ==References== Category:Villages in New York (state) Category:County seats in New York (state)
title: Goshen (village), New York
